data.name: Viek the Spire
data.locationDescription: Viek the Spire spawns in taskmaster spots around Westwall Prison in Sepermeru.

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Standing near the Wheel of Pain.
Standing near the Wheel of Pain.

data.name: Talaan
data.locationDescription: Talaan spawns rather rarely, around Armorer spots by the Black Galleon

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Kneeling in front of some jugs.
Under a single-person tent next to a cage. Many thralls share this spawn.
By the campfire with an archer

data.name: Landora the Groomer
data.locationDescription: Spawns at archer spots at the Pagoda of Boundless Lust, both inside the building and outside at the ledge.

data.name: Beast the Breaker
data.locationDescription: Spawns in J4 at the Big River. Shares a spawn point with Floki the Tinkerer.

data.name: Floki the Tinkerer
data.locationDescription: Spawns in J4 at the Big River. Shares a spawn with Beast the Breaker.

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Stands in front of the hut.

data.name: Serpa the Gem Cutter
data.locationDescription: Spawns in alchemist spots around Sepermeru.

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Near the water at a bridge.
Gossiping with alchemists around a brazier.
With a second alchemist infront of a hut.

data.name: Ivar the Crafty One
data.locationDescription: Ivar spawns in various Nordheimer settlements including New Asgarth. Spawns are shared with the blacksmith thralls.

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Talking with a smelter by the blacksmith bench.

data.name: Akasuki the Binder
data.locationDescription: Akasuki spawns in various Nordheimer settlements including New Asgarth. Spawns are shared with the blacksmith thralls.

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Talking with a smelter by the blacksmith bench.

data.name: Alfhild
data.locationDescription: Alfhild spawns on blacksmith spots around the Black Galleon

locations.spawnSpotDetail: Fiddling with the chest on the bench in the back.
Sitting next to the anvil under the tent

items.name: Lemurian Rune
